author: Video Advice
description:
Chase Hughes is a behavior science expert, author, and former U.S. Navy Chief. With decades of experience in human behavior analysis, persuasion, and interrogation, he is widely recognized for developing advanced techniques in influence, body language decoding, and psychological profiling. Hughes trains intelligence agencies, law enforcement, and businesses worldwide, sharing powerful tools for communication and human influence.

If you want to learn more from Chase Hughes, we highly recommend exploring his training and teachings - nci.university/home_main

Excerpts courtesy of Danny Jones and The Joe Rogan Experience.
Watch the full interviews here:
Danny Jones – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QjmzctByDx0
Joe Rogan – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_R2JwJ0A1QE

title: The Book the CIA Copied Word for Word, Then Tried To Erase
